C

chat(String, List<Message>) - Method in class io.github.nozyx12.ollama4j.OllamaClient
Sends a chat request to the Ollama API and returns the response.

M

Message - Class in io.github.nozyx12.ollama4j
Represents a message exchanged between a user and the API.
Message(String, String) - Constructor for class io.github.nozyx12.ollama4j.Message

O

OllamaClient - Class in io.github.nozyx12.ollama4j
Client for interacting with the Ollama API, allowing for chat exchanges with models.
OllamaClient() - Constructor for class io.github.nozyx12.ollama4j.OllamaClient
Constructs a client with the default host IP (127.0.0.1) and port (11434).
OllamaClient(String, int) - Constructor for class io.github.nozyx12.ollama4j.OllamaClient
